skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Matchless, a Royal Navy M-class destroyer! After my escort missions in the Arctic, I was in the Battle of the North Cape, and then I helped escort Queen Mary! My name makes me sound powerful, but in reality, I'm totally helpless!
skins.acquisition: We meet at last, Commander! I am Matchless, an M-class Destroyer! Ah, although my name is "Matchless," I'm actually very weak. Ehe~ Commander, will you protect me?
skins.login: You look sad, Commander... Let's try this... Hehe~ Feel better?
skins.details: Everyone has someone they want to protect... So don't protect just me, okay, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle1: You know flattery won't get you anywhere with me, right?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Oh dear, it's getting cold again... Commander, can you lend me your coat when we leave port?
skins.secretaryIdle3: I hope I can just stay as your secretary forever... Hm? What? I didn't say anything!
skins.secretaryTouch: Can I just stay with you forever, Commander?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Because of that... I'm subtracting a few points off your record~!

skins.JPClientName: エスコ`トしてくださ`い！
skins.shipDescription: Ah, Commander, over here! Hm, you're going to take care of all the plans for today's date? In that case, I look forward to seeing just how suave you can be! Hehe~
